logger_multicast_backend v0.2.0 → Overview → LoggerMulticastSender

LoggerMulticastSender

  • Summary
  • Functions

Implements the sending-server for the LoggerMulticastBackend. This uses genserver to provide a managed timer-based sender for multicast logs

Summary↑

handle_info(arg1, state)

handle a timer with a valid socket - attempt to write to it
